Posts.Content: Hello, my mother was just diagnosed with this same type of cancer and I was wondering if you may be able to offer any additional information. I realize it has been quite some time since your original post, but I am hopeful that we may be able to engage in conversation!
Posts.Title: Pure Squamous Carcinoma (Breast Cancer)

Posts.Content: My mother was recently diagnosed with pure squamous cell carcinoma of the breast. I am interested if locating any and all information that anyone has about this specific disesase and also would appreciate any advice that anyone has!!
Posts.Title: Pure squamous cell carcinoma of the breast
